text: Filip Stanković (; born 3 January 1997) is a Serbian footballer, who plays as a defender for Car Konstantin on loan from Radnički Niš. ==Club career== After he spent his youth career with Red Star Belgrade, Stanković moved to OFK Beograd on one-year loan in summer 2016. After the end of first half-season in which he made 4 appearances for OFK Beograd, a loan deal was terminated and he returned to his home club. After the end of contract with the club, Stanković left Red Star as a free agent in summer 2017. Shortly after he left his former club, Stanković signed a five-year deal with Radnički Niš in last days of July 2017. ==International career== Stanković was called into national team levels since 2013, when he was elected into the Serbia under-16 national team squad.
